nodes.text: An human male served within the ground forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic with the military rank of captain. During the Battle of Vrogas Vas, the captain was stationed in the Rebel Refueling Base as Princess Leia Organa and the remaining Heroes of Yavin arrived as reinforcements. At the base, the captain provided a situational report to Commander Organa, and provided details of Luke Skywalker's encounter with Darth Vader. He then followed Princess Leia's orders to regroup and engage Vader.
